title: Stories & Blog Block

fields.label: Heading
fields.name: heading
fields.instructions: Enter the main heading for the section

fields.label: Subheading
fields.name: subheading
fields.default_value: Your partner through complexities of Agile and DevOps transformation
fields.placeholder: Your partner through complexities of Agile and DevOps transformation

fields.label: Heading Color
fields.name: heading_color
fields.instructions: Choose the color for the main heading

fields.label: Subheading Color
fields.name: subheading_color
fields.instructions: Choose the color for the subheading text

fields.label: Card Label
fields.name: card_label
fields.instructions: Enter the label text that appears on each card (e.g., 'BLOG POST', 'CASE STUDY'). Leave empty to auto-generate from post type.

fields.label: Post Type
fields.name: post_type
fields.instructions: Select the post type to display. This will determine which content type to display.

fields.label: Category
fields.name: category
fields.instructions: Select a category to filter by (leave empty for all categories). Categories will update based on the selected post type.

fields.label: Button Text
fields.name: button_text
fields.instructions: Enter the text for the CTA button

fields.label: Button URL
fields.name: button_url
fields.instructions: Enter the URL for the CTA button

fields.label: Background Color
fields.name: background_color
fields.instructions: Choose a background color for the section

fields.label: Background Image
fields.name: background_image
fields.instructions: Upload a background image (optional). This will overlay the background color.

description: Dynamic content block that displays latest 4 posts from a configured post type and category with customizable background and heading colors
